Simon Munzu said Thursday that security forces loyal to Gbagbo had used sexual torture techniques on at least one Alassane Ouattara supporter, following a raid on Alassane Ouattara 's party headquarters two weeks ago in which 63 people were arrested. This young man was sodomized by eight members of the Republican Guard who wanted to extract information about his fellow members of the( pro-Alassane Ouattara) RHDP, Simon Munzu said. There was no immediate reaction from Gbagbo's camp, though his spokesman has previously denied allegations that security forces were behind cases of abduction and torture.
